Presented a lightning talk on “Turing.jl: An Overview”. The talk was an overview of Turing.jl which is a Julia library focusing on Bayesian inference with probabilistic programming. This was the first edition of [PackagingCon 2021](https://packaging-con.org), which is a conference held with the aim to bring various software ecosystems together.
